name: InvoiceNo must not be null
message: InvoiceNo must be a non-null, non-empty string or integer.

name: InvoiceNo pattern restriction
message: InvoiceNo should not contain any special characters or spaces.

name: StockCode must not be null
message: StockCode must be a non-null, non-empty string.

name: StockCode pattern restriction
message: StockCode should not contain any special characters, except for known patterns like alphanumeric codes.

name: Quantity must be positive
message: Quantity should be greater than or equal to 1.

name: InvoiceDate valid range
message: InvoiceDate should fall within the range of expected business operation dates.

name: UnitPrice must be positive
message: UnitPrice should be greater than zero.

name: CustomerID must not be null
message: CustomerID must be a non-null, non-empty string or integer.

name: Country must not be null
message: Country must be a non-null, non-empty string.
